reviews.text: Do not try the kaviar at breakfast! Leave! Run! Fast!

dodgy staff and the business rooms are awful-dirty walls. dark spots on curtain, dirty sheets... the only plus: free WiFi

Вино хорошее, комнаты большие, цены умеренные:) футбол смотрим!
Great hotel, perfect treatment, good service and food, comfortable rooms. Near the city centre, you should really come here if you are in Berlin.
Haircut downstairs

Nice hotel. Different, but nice!
The place to stay at while in Berlin
By far the nicest place to stay in Berlin. Cross between design hotel & serviced apartments. Amazing value for money too, but book well in advance as tends to be fully booked almost all the time...
Where are the nuts?
Room 217 is Amazing
Great location and great restaurant.
Wow! Great design, great service, Aveda soaps, everything is Adidas-branded and a nice atmosphere
Viel zu teuer! Parplatz, klimaanlage, internet, frühstück kostet extra. Kaum zu glauben, dass die nutzung der unsinnig verstylten duschen nicht extra berechnet wird... Sehr mittelmäßig!
Rooms and service are great.
Simply Food Online -comfortable and free of charge at  http://www.pizzaliefer.de/pizza-liefer-service-germany/berlin
Awesome location which hosts a free buffet starting from midnight. Friendly and helpful staff who give Internet Access for free if you ask kindly. Favourite place with The Weimeister together. 5 star
Hôtel très sympa, calme, design et en plein centre de Berlin. Un mix entre chambre d'hôtel et appartement.
Great people. Love THE place ( not only because everything is addidas branded) great service at the restaurant ..
Amazing hotel in the heart of the Mitte. Friendly service and beautiful design. Ask for the odd number rooms which are quiet and have the park view.
Unfortunately they started charging for Wifi - not exaptable. Otherwise a stylish hotel with friendly staff.
Very good. Don't be put off by an unorthodox shower placement, it'z great...
Internet is not free - 10 euro per 24h.
Если нужно стильное и уютное жилье в центре Берлина, то вам сюда :)
Отличный отель с отличным расположением, вменяемыми ценами и действительно хорошими номерами, но интернет ужасный и платный.
В субботу и воскресенье завтрак до 13.00, просто отлично!
Gr8 service fri3ndly people
Can't make my mind up on whether I love or hate this place. It's certainly very different to the hotels I normally stay in!
Very nice hotel/apartments with friendly staff. WiFi is not cheap (bad signal too) and only for 12 hours though they advertise with "24 stunden".  Other than that nice and centrally located!
Very Nice but NO BREAKFAST !!! The restaurant ont finished yet and the breakfast is served at the hotel next door..,
Great breakfast! :) Wifi very expensive :((
Tip for receptionists:  behave more customer friendly, hide your arrogance, say hello to your guests and try to put à smile on your face.
personal nicht sehr freundlich, routinierte abfertigung. wlan kostenpflichtig und teuer. ansonsten gute zimmer und ruhiges ambiente. würde wieder einchecken

Try the free water in the lobby. There are free candies too!
Toda rede NH Hoteles so libera free internet por 30 min depois é necessario pegar outra senha
Im here if you speak english dont come here. They are very unpollied and dont care about that you said. This is a hotel for a germany people that is so bad

Zimmer mit enormer Deckenhöhe aber irgendwie nicht wirklich charmant. na für eine Nacht wird's gehen
Friendly hotel staff, decently cleaned rooms, excellent start for eastern Berlin. Just insanely priced wifi, nothing more ;-)

WiFi zu teuer , sonst schönes Hotel

В 50 м от станции, что с одной стороны хорошо, для вас открыты все двери, но с другой стороны очень шумно

Free Internet access codes are available at reception
Most helpful ,friendly reception staff of all 100+ hotels hotels I visit yearly ! A+++
Nice hotel. There is a train station nearby but the sound isn't annoying. Free Wifi, (although it's not fast) friendly staff and in the middle of the city close to most touristic attractions.

Nice staff and good service.
Great breakfast buffet with make your own waffle station. Availible to non guests as well.
Kind staff was the highlight. Otherwise nothing special, though it's clean and gets the job done.
Nice rooms. Service is poor. Bar sucks.
Really nice place!! Had a very nice stay here, its close to all big sights has a huge breakfast buffet and I other than the guys before me liked the bar alot!
For the cost I thought this was good, breakfast, service, room maid all good. Bad is the bar (it's the foyer!) and the toilet paper (I felt as if I'd been bum raped!)
Have a relaxing sleep in the rooms which offer modern amenities such as multifunctional flat screens, in-room safes and the latest multimedia equipment.

Great place to have as a base for exploring the city. Start at checkpoint Charlie! Nice staff, impressive rooms, luxury breakfast.
Keine Klimaanlage, keine Minibar.. wifi nur am Empfang.. LAN Kabel gibt es im Zimmer

Das Pop-up-Hotel "Q! Casa Berlin" ist ein Projekt von Wolgang Loock (www.loock-hotels.com). Spannende Geschichte, denn das Hotel wird nach wenigen Monaten wieder abtauchen.
Nice appartments near a nice shoppingstreet! 2 blocks away from nice restaurants and smaller shops! Nearby the subway. Comfertable foldingup bed becomes a sofa and you have a livingroom.
It's a very nice and not expensive apartment place, the  rooms are news,whit a little kitchen and it's near different metro station. A good position to visit Berlin.
Nice place but no wifi Internet in rooms.
Nice, cheap and cozy. Definitely yes to choose when staying in Berlin. Quiet place in the heart of the city.
Very nice apartments and well situated near the heart of the city and major shopping destinations. Apartment rooms are so good planned and very comfortable. Would definitely recommend to stay.
Nice and helpful staff, good apartments... wi-fi only in the lobby, internet in the room by cable only...
They are installing wifi now. Pro tip, bring your computer and a cable, then set it up as your own local hotspot for free wifi ;)

Gran albergue con wifi en el bar de arriba y en el de abajo pero no en las habitaciones. Futbolín y billar gratis y cervezas a1€.
Great hostel : wherever you are, Wombats are a safe choice. Wifi is quite slow at peak hours, and breakfast not included/a bit pricey. Other than that, great (bath)rooms/staff/facilities/location.
clean rooms, beds and bathrooms. paid 12€ for a night in a 6-bed-dorm. good bar, nice staff. do!

günstig schlafen. Sauber und relativ gute verkehrsanbindung.
